name: Pandemia 2025
description:
In Pandemia: 2025 you take the role of John, a loner man whose destiny is to find the cure that can save humanity. Along with his dog friend, Rex, will enter the reigns of an abandoned facilities where some say it lingers the world’s only salvation.

- Recommended resolution : 1920x1080.

- Still on Development, expect some issues on gameplay.
